website_summaries.verdict: Works all around the eye as a base for both shadow and concealer.
pros: Stops creases and keeps shadow in place
The neutral shades also work well to make a flawless no-makeup look
A little product goes a long way
cons: Shades do not always match skin tone, especially on darker complexions

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey for the result.
customer_reviews.text: This eye primer does not live up to it’s reputation. It only works for about three hours. Not all day. It’s too pricey to have to reapply every three hours all day long. I was extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Blaker

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for darkened eyelids!
customer_reviews.text: My eyes are deep set and my eyelids are darker than my complexion. I prefer to wear lighter colors on my mobile lid to make my eyes pop. This is the best product I have found for allowing the eye shadow color to remain true and actually show up. It's more expensive than drugstore brands, but worth it. Somedays I don't even put any eye shadow over it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzeanna

customer_reviews.title: Liquid gold
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every concealer under the sun. This stuff is liquid gold! I got it as a primer, and it works well as one, but I also found that I can many times get away with just using this. The only problem I have had is buying some on ebay and the consistency was not right. Turns out it was expired. (you can check online by lot #).
customer_reviews.author: Felicia M

customer_reviews.title: Not As Described
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item it described the pump dispenser version and what I received was the wand version. I’ve used both in the past and prefer the pump since it’s difficult to get to the last of what’s left with the wand. Additionally, I ordered the fair (the lightest color) and received light/medium which is too dark for my complexion. Not worth the hassle to return. Will go to Sephora next time.
customer_reviews.author: NWgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy it at the Benefits counter at Macy's but they don't carry it in the stores anymore. I use it for what it's made for, and I use it as concealer too.
customer_reviews.author: Pam D'Aliesio

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. The packaging is the problem it doesn't seem to be much in there.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Better price deal on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Lightens and does a great cover job on your “Little flaws”.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Still in love after all these years
customer_reviews.text: Still in love after all these years. Easy to apply. Keeps shadow in place and liner from running. Also seems to keep my face from becoming oily during the day!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Lane

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have hooded eyelids and could not wear mascara without looking like a raccoon. This product is pricey but worth every penny. It is easy to apply and works very well on those hot and humid summer days. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Stays Put!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this and use it for under my brown and under my eyes as well as my eyelid. Love the shade and it blends in so well.
customer_reviews.author: petrina harget

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. I use it for a eyelid primer and under eye coverage for dark circles. It's even better because with prime it comes straight to you.
customer_reviews.author: Robot Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great product, okay packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyelid primer I have found out of all the products I've tried. It lasts all day and doesn't cause eyeshadow to clump. When I received the product it was wrapped in bubble wrap by itself, no box or anything. I inspected it to make sure it was new and everything appears ok. I have purchased this product from other websites where it came packaged in a box. It doesn't deter me from purchasing or using the product, but when you pay full price for an item you expect a little nicer packaging.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Stay Put Stays!
customer_reviews.text: The eye-make-up base is terrific. This was my second time buying it because I never want to run out. Eye shadow and liner truly stay put - no smearing or wearing off. I use it on my eyelids up to my brow and under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Butler

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: Helps concealer stay in place all day and is lightweight. I like this product a lot!
customer_reviews.author: gktgkt

customer_reviews.title: I have used this religiously for years. I won't ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this religiously for years. I won't be caught without it. I do prefer the old squeeze tube to this with the wand as it gets contaminated quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi EG

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for several years. Great at concealer those little imperfections (like red spots). I've seen this product sold in a pump but also in a wand applicator. Both methods deliver!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha of California

customer_reviews.title: which works a lot better and doesn't waste as much product
customer_reviews.text: The product is not actually a pump bottle, it is a screwcap with a brush, which works a lot better and doesn't waste as much product.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani

customer_reviews.title: This works as a comceleaer and to keep eye make ...
customer_reviews.text: This works as a comceleaer and to keep eye make up in place. It really helps to brighten the eyes too.
customer_reviews.author: sdraplin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - have been using this for several years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product I love it! The shipping was very fast
customer_reviews.author: ASMA HASSAN

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find this on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for awhile and was happy to see it on Amazon. Does what it should and more.
customer_reviews.author: AZLoneStar

customer_reviews.title: The reason why I give this so few stars isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I give this so few stars isn't because it does *NOT* work. Its because it does not work as well as other products half this price! I have tried some high and low end products but I am going to stick with Lime Crime High Performing Waterproof Eyeshadow Primer for less than twenty dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I’ve used it for 10 yrs or so. Keeps makeup from running and fading around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Vicci Allen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I use it under my eyemakup and my lipstick to keep them to stay put all day!
customer_reviews.author: H. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great !!! Pretty much covers up all that we would like to hide !!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I am a Benefit makeup junkie and this by far is one of my faves!
customer_reviews.author: FabOn5th

customer_reviews.title: Great product :)
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than great! It does a great job in covering up the dark circles I occasionally get when I don't get that 6 + hours of sleep I need! It does not "cake" on, it feels smooth and goes and covers on easily. I absolutely love it and hope others try it to and when they do, you'll need to make LOTS more...don't run out cause I'll be buying again from you. :)
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LoVe this stuff!!! I ordered it twice. I use it as eye shadow base and under concealer and it works great😉
customer_reviews.author: Saba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found out about this product through free samples and now I cannot live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but overpriced on here
customer_reviews.text: Love this product however it’s over priced on Amazon. I’ve always had a problem with creasing and this works great and lasts all day at work. You can get it at Sephora for $25.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: the product arrived sealed but the bottle had almost no product in it. It is sub par for a product that cost almost $40. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Got this based on a friend's rave review, so some people love it. After trying it out a couple times it turned out to cover as well as my maybelline concealer ($8).
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: It works nice, but nothing will ever beat FYeye and its ...
customer_reviews.text: I work for Benefit. This product should only cost 26 bucks. Dont let them over charge you. It works nice, but nothing will ever beat FYeye and its discontinued. It helps hold your shadow on but its not my fav. Sorry but just an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Wendylynn44

product_meta.title: Benefit Cosmetics Stay Don't Stray Stay-put Primer for Concealers & Eye Shadows (Light/medium)
product_meta.description: Benefit Cosmetics Stay Don't Stray Stay-put Primer for Concealers & Eye Shadows (Light/medium)
feature_bullets: Benefit Cosmetics Stay Don't Stray Stay-put Primer for Concealers & Eye Shadows (Light/medium)
